Skills.Name: Energy Field 10%
Skills.Description: Skilled use of shield reduces melee damage by 10%!

Skills.Name: Energy Field 20%
Skills.Description: Adept use of shield reduces melee damage by 20%! Slight boost to Uberhero Skill Energy Field. Superior skill to Energy Field 10.

Skills.Name: Energy Field 30%
Skills.Description: Masterful use of shield reduces melee damage by 30%! Boost to Uberhero Skill Energy Field. Superior skill to Energy Field 20.

Skills.Name: Energy Field 40%
Skills.Description: Astounding use of shield reduces melee damage by 40%! Large boost to Uberhero Skill Energy Field. Superior skill to Energy Field 30.

Skills.Name: Energy Field 50%
Skills.Description: Ultimate shield-bearing Patapon! Reduces melee damage by 50%! Huge boost to Uberhero Skill Energy Field. Superior to Energy Field 40.

Skills.Name: Set Skills 1
Skills.Description: Gain an additional set skill slot.

Skills.Name: Set Skills 2
Skills.Description: Gain 2 Set Skill slots. Superior skill to Set Skills 1.

Skills.Name: Set Skills 3
Skills.Description: Gain 3 Set Skill slots. Superior skill to Set Skills 2.

Skills.Name: Set Skills 4
Skills.Description: Gain 4 Set Skill slots. Superior skill to Set Skills 3.

Skills.Name: Wood Smasher
Skills.Description: Inflicts extra damage to wooden obstacles.
Skills.Tip: Hitting Treants should work (with rain, no fire).

Skills.Name: Stone Smasher
Skills.Description: Inflicts extra damage to stone obstacles.

Skills.Name: Metal Smasher
Skills.Description: Inflicts extra damage to metal obstacles.
Skills.Tip: Break STRUCTURES, like missiles. According to some report DOOR SPAMMING DOESN'T WORK.

Skills.Name: Everything Smasher
Skills.Description: Attack element becomes crush. Prevents enemy shield evasion. ★Welcome bonus: attack power +50%.

Skills.Name: Anti-Stagger
Skills.Description: Total immunity from stagger.

Skills.Name: Anti-Knockback
Skills.Description: Total immunity to knockback.

Skills.Name: Anti-Sleep
Skills.Description: Total immunity from sleep.

Skills.Name: Anti-Poison
Skills.Description: Total immunity to poison.

Skills.Name: Poison Hide
Skills.Description: Occasionally poisons attacker. Activated by enemy melee attack.
Skills.Tip: Kibadeth or dragon puppies (level 19 recommended mission) will help. Bring your best defence equipment.

Skills.Name: Doppelganger
Skills.Description: Immunity to status effects while attacking.
Skills.Tip: PARTYING WILL DO NOTHING. Use Chakachaka instead to Ponpon to deal less damage. Also Peerless penguin can help if you have one.

Skills.Name: Poison Bomb
Skills.Description: User explodes when killed, spreading poison.
Skills.Tip: Peerless dragon might help, but if don't, go HEROES NEVER REST, die, drink potion (when dark heroes die they drop) and full recover. Grass grower (or bowmunk ponchaka~ponpon) + FIRE equipment + PEERLESS SHEEP is fast way to die.

Skills.Name: Natural Enemy
Skills.Description: Inflicts 8x damage when attacking Taterazay and Guardira foes. ★Welcome bonus: 2x attack speed.
Skills.Tip: You can find 6 Tatedeths from first in COVET-HISS LOVES CANNONS (around level 25 mission). Set DEFAULT WEAPON, and Peerless penguin if you have. HERO MODE will be fast, if the Myamsar is hero.

Skills.Name: Tiny Base
Skills.Description: Strengthens small structures i.e. boulders, flowers, cannons, catapults, ice walls, etc.
Skills.Tip: Having VS quests may also help.

Skills.Name: Mid Base
Skills.Description: Strengthens mid structures i.e. lookouts, forts, stone walls, etc. Superior skill to Tiny Base.
Skills.Tip: Having VS quests may also help.

Skills.Name: Big Base
Skills.Description: Strengthens large structures i.e. castles, towers, giant ice walls, etc. Superior skill to Mid Base.
Skills.Tip: Having VS quests may also help.

Skills.Name: Super Fortress
Skills.Description: Repairs structure HP every 4 seconds. Affects structures on Versus stage, and structures built using skills. ★Welcome bonus: 2x brush / tree healing.
Skills.Tip: Having VS quests may also help.

Skills.Name: Zapper 1
Skills.Description: Emits a small shockwave where the weapon strikes ground.
Skills.Tip: DO NOT CHARGE ATTACK. Make sure to HIT THE GROUND. Hero mode works.

Skills.Name: Zapper 2
Skills.Description: Causes a shockwave. Superior skill to Zapper 1.
Skills.Tip: DO NOT CHARGE ATTACK. Make sure to HIT THE GROUND. Hero mode works.

Skills.Name: Zapper 3
Skills.Description: Causes a large shockwave. Superior skill to Zapper 2.
Skills.Tip: DO NOT CHARGE ATTACK. Make sure to HIT THE GROUND. Hero mode works.

Skills.Name: Zapper 4
Skills.Description: Causes a gigantic shockwave. Superior skill to Zapper 3.
Skills.Tip: DO NOT CHARGE ATTACK. Make sure to HIT THE GROUND. Hero mode works.

Skills.Name: Zapper 5
Skills.Description: Causes a supreme shockwave. Superior skill to Zapper 4.
Skills.Tip: DO NOT CHARGE ATTACK. Make sure to HIT THE GROUND. Hero mode works.
